H0.text: Saturn is the second largest planet in the solar system, known for its beautiful rings.

H1.text: Mars is the second largest planet in the solar system, known for its beautiful rings.

H2.text: Jupiter is the second largest planet in the solar system, known for its beautiful rings.

H3.text: Venus is the second largest planet in the solar system known for its beautiful rings.

A4.text: Saturn is the sixth planet from the Sun and the second largest in the Solar System, after Jupiter.
